job.title: Data Engineer
job.description: DESCRIPTION             ltbrgt	These contingent workers will work closely with fulltime research scientists and software engineers who are leadingltbrgt	computer vision research projects to ensure that the process runs smoothly and that data annotation quality remains high toltbrgt	train stateoftheart machine learning models Duties includeltbrgt	Data wrangling writing data pipelines to upload annotations automatically running existing ML models on large volumes ofltbrgt	data adhoc data analysis  visualizationltbrgtltbrgtAnnotation task and vendor management ltbrgt	creating data annotation guidelines curating ideal gold standard examples for annotatorsltbrgt	managing backandforth communications with annotators reviewing annotation quality to identify themes andltbrgt	relaying appropriate feedback to annotation vendorsltbrgtltbrgtSkills requiredltbrgt	SQL Python Linux command line Bashltbrgt	Very high attention to detail for managing large complex annotation effortsltbrgt	Good written communication skills to coordinate with annotators and team membersltbrgt	2 years work experience including experience working with customer teamsltbrgtltbrgtTop musthave HARD skillsltbrgt	SQL and Python is a needltbrgt	Linux command lineltbrgtltbrgtTop 3 goodtohave skillsltbrgt	Great communicationltbrgt	Understanding of AI models would be greatltbrgtltbrgtInterview LoopProcessltbrgt	2 coding interviews and 1 general interviewltbrgt	PDF homeworkoffline analysis will submit the answers along with their resumeltbrgt
